amendment.description: To provide for the continuation of National Cemetery Administration surveys.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3081 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3081 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Rounds to Amendment SA 3411. To provide for the continuation of National Cemetery Administration surveys.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3081 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Rounds to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3081 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
